item.title: Data Input and Analysis Using Google BigQuery or Microsoft Power BI - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a skilled data analyst to input a dataset into a tool like Google BigQuery or Microsoft Power BI. The task involves:

Importing and organizing the data in the tool (you make the choice)
Generating summary statistics for key insights such as average price, mileage, car age, fuel type distribution, etc. (will provide)
Creating visualizations to represent these insights clearly and effectively.
Requirements:

Knowledge of Google BigQuery or Microsoft Power BI.
Experience in data analysis and visualization.

If you have the expertise and are interested in this project, please submit your proposal along with examples of similar work you have done.

Budget: $30
Posted On: July 15, 2024 10:16 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Data Analysis, Data Visualization
Skills: Data Analysis, Data Visualization
Country: Greece
click to apply

item.title: Python Charting Specialist - Need to convert an Excel data to Chart - Upwork
item.description:
I have an excel file which has  9 to 10 columns of data. What I need is to get the data from the excel and convert it into a chart which is rendered in a browser.

I can provide the excel to you. I need an chart which can be rendered in a browser once I finish running the script.
I need the chart to be exactly looking like this one
https://altair-viz.github.io/gallery/seattle_weather_interactive.html
and the language should be python and if we use altair charting library, it would be great but up to you.

The moment I feed an csv file, it should give me an chart

The X - Axis should be the time and the Y-Axis should be the LTP

In the url, https://altair-viz.github.io/gallery/seattle_weather_interactive.html , there are range calculations. I need a range calculation automatically calculated from the LTP column .

I can discuss more but I need all of the below to be captured in both the top chart and the bottom chart

LTP
BuyPrice
BuyQty
SellPrice
SellQty
LTQ
Outcome

Let me know if you need more information. I am not worried about the library of choice but I need the same chart as in the above url . I dont mind if you use the same code with alterations. But wish to have the click and drag feature as it is in the url.

Budget: $350
Posted On: July 15, 2024 07:44 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft Excel, Data Visualization, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization, Computer Engineering, Data Science, Marketing Analytics, Office 365, Microsoft Power Automate, Visualization, Automation, Microsoft PowerApps, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Power BI Development
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft Excel, Data Visualization, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization, Computer Engineering, Data Science, Marketing Analytics, Office 365, Microsoft Power Automate, Visualization, Automation, Microsoft PowerApps, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Power BI Development
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: External Audit Manager - Upwork
item.description:
JOB DESCRIPTION
• Managed a portfolio of clientele including small and medium enterprises, charities, and multinational companies.
• Performed planning for all of the audit engagements.
• Managed a team of Audit Professionals and assisted the Audit Partners in delivering Assurance Services that comply with Financial Reporting Standards and Singapore Standards of Auditing.
• Performed review work of the Audit Team’s findings.
• Developed and maintained long-term client relationships.
• Coached and mentored Audit Professionals.
• Performed other duties as assigned by the Audit Partner.
• Plan and schedule for the audit assignment.
• Management and supervision of staff.
• Review audit work papers.
JOB REQUIREMENTS
• Accountancy Degree, ACCA or Masters.
• Min 5 years of working experience in a CPA Audit firm with at least 4-5 years of supervisory role.
• Possess Leadership qualities.
• Ability to lead a team.
• Qualified candidates will be remunerated according to their experience and competency.
• Staff management experience including mentoring, counselling, and recruitment.
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
• Strong technical knowledge.
• Good team player.
• Highly motivated and with a strong desire to progress.



Posted On: July 15, 2024 06:10 UTC
Category: Accounting
Skills:Financial Reporting, Corporate Finance, SAP, Analytical Presentation, Tally.ERP, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Power BI, Financial Audit, Management Accounting, Finance, Tax Accounting, Account Reconciliation, Income Statement, Balance Sheet
Skills: Financial Reporting, Corporate Finance, SAP, Analytical Presentation, Tally.ERP, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Power BI, Financial Audit, Management Accounting, Finance, Tax Accounting, Account Reconciliation, Income Statement, Balance Sheet
Country: India

item.title: Power app application development  - Upwork
item.description:
We seek an experienced Power Apps Developer to create a custom application to manage our manufacturing process. The app will consist of screens:

Login Screen:

-User authentication
-Welcome message

Production Planning Screen:
-Form-based data entry for daily production activities
-Input fields for various process stages (Inspection, Degreasing, Pickling, etc.)
-Editable entries for ease of data modification

Process Monitoring Screen:

-Visual representation of process stages
-Indicators for process completion and alerts
-Historical data storage and retrieval

Responsibilities:

-Develop and deploy a user-friendly Power Apps application
-Implement data input forms and validation
-Create visual process monitoring dashboards
-Integrate with existing databases and systems
-Ensure secure user authentication

Requirements:
-Proven experience in Power Apps development
-Strong understanding of the galvanizing process
-Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
-Excellent communication skills
-Preferred Skills:


Please find detailed information in the document attached.

Experience with Power Automate for workflow automation
Knowledge of database management and integration
Please provide your portfolio and previous experience in similar projects.

Budget: $480
Posted On: July 15, 2024 06:51 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power Automate, Microsoft PowerApps, Microsoft SharePoint, AI Builder, Automation, System Automation, Mobile App, Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft Infopath, SQL, Microsoft Teams, Artificial Intelligence
Skills: Microsoft Power Automate, Microsoft PowerApps, Microsoft SharePoint, AI Builder, Automation, System Automation, Mobile App, Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft Infopath, SQL, Microsoft Teams, Artificial Intelligence

item.title: Data Scientist  - Upwork
item.description:
Here is a general description of what I am looking for, if you think you can meet most of the requirements please apply.

A highly experienced professional in the field of data science, responsible for leading and managing complex data projects, developing advanced analytical models, and deriving actionable insights from large datasets. They play a critical role in shaping the data strategy and driving decision-making processes within an organization. Senior Data Scientists are expected to possess deep expertise in statistical analysis, machine learning, and data engineering, along with strong problem-solving and leadership skills.

Key Responsibilities:

Model Development and Deployment:
Design, develop, and deploy advanced machine learning models to solve complex business problems.
Ensure models are scalable, efficient, and robust, suitable for production environments.
Data Analysis and Insights:
Perform exploratory data analysis to identify trends, patterns, and anomalies.
Translate complex analytical results into actionable business insights and recommendations.

Project Leadership:
Lead data science projects from ideation to implementation, managing timelines, resources, and stakeholder expectations.
Mentor and guide junior data scientists and analysts, fostering a collaborative and innovative team environment.

Collaboration and Communication:
Work closely with cross-functional teams, including engineering, product management, and business stakeholders, to understand their needs and deliver data-driven solutions.
Communicate findings and insights effectively to both technical and non-technical audiences.
Continuous Improvement:

Stay updated with the latest advancements in data science, machine learning, and related technologies.
Continuously improve and refine analytical methods, tools, and processes to enhance the overall efficiency and effectiveness of the data science team.
Qualifications and Skills:

Experience:
Typically, 5+ years of experience in data science or a related field, with a proven track record of successfully leading data projects and developing complex models.
Technical Skills: Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, and SQL. Experience with machine learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch) and data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).
Analytical Skills: Strong understanding of statistical methods, machine learning algorithms, and data engineering principles.

Soft Skills:
Excellent problem-solving, communication, and leadership skills. Ability to work effectively in a team-oriented, collaborative environment.

Remember, I am not expecting you to know everything but the skills you already have are enough for me to consider you as a candidate. I just need you to review the role and qualifications and confirm if you can be taught to do the job.

Compensation: Opportunity to get hired full-time.

Please let me know if the role interests you so we can discuss further.

Thank You!

Rakib Uddin

Hourly Range: $10.00-$25.00
Posted On: July 15, 2024 07:01 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Statistics, pandas, Python, Machine Learning Model, R, RStudio, Data Mining, Deep Learning Modeling, Data Analytics & Visualization Software, Econometrics, TensorFlow Lite, React, Deep Learning Framework
Skills: Statistics, pandas, Python, Machine Learning Model, R, RStudio, Data Mining, Deep Learning Modeling, Data Analytics & Visualization Software, Econometrics, TensorFlow Lite, React, Deep Learning Framework
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Power Bi dashboard  - Upwork
item.description:
Objective:
Create an interactive Power BI dashboard for analyzing procurement and financial data from multiple Excel files.

Data Integration:

-Connect to a OneDrive/SharePoint folder containing multiple Excel files.
-Ensure automatic updates when new files are added.

DAX Measures:

-Total Spend, YoY Growth %, MoM Change %, Cumulative Spend, Spend Forecast, Supplier Performance Index, Spend Anomaly, and Top 5 Suppliers.

Visualizations:

-KPI Cards: Total Spend, YoY Growth %, MoM Change %, Number of Transactions.
-Line Chart: Cumulative Spend, YoY Growth.
-Combo Chart: MoM Spend Change.
-Bar Chart: Top 5 Suppliers by Amount.
-Pie Chart: Spend Distribution by Item Detail.
-Scatter Plot: Spend Anomalies.


Attached canva page with exact specification

Budget: $40
Posted On: July 15, 2024 07:04 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Digital Mapping, Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization, Microsoft Excel, Business Intelligence, Microsoft Power BI Development, Data Modeling
Skills: Digital Mapping, Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization, Microsoft Excel, Business Intelligence, Microsoft Power BI Development, Data Modeling
Country: India

item.title: Assistant exécutif bilingue – Département des ventes et équipe support backoffice - Upwork
item.description:
Le service des ventes et l’équipe administrative du Chiffre est à la recherche d’un assistant exécutif afin de soutenir ces 2 équipes dans diverses tâches administratives. L’assistant exécutif fait partie intégrante des opérations des départements par son implication dans les opérations, le service à la clientèle, la digitalisation et l’amélioration continue.
Compétences requises
- Maîtrise avancée d'Excel : Une connaissance approfondie de Microsoft Excel est indispensable. Le candidat doit être en mesure de gérer des feuilles de calcul complexes, d'utiliser des formules avancées, de créer des tableaux croisés dynamiques, et d'effectuer des analyses de données. La capacité à visualiser des données à travers des graphiques et des tableaux, et à automatiser des tâches via des macros, est également souhaitée. Cette compétence permettra d'améliorer l'efficacité et la précision dans le traitement et l'analyse de grandes quantités de données.
- Compétences en formatage de présentations : Maîtrise de la création et du formatage de présentations sous Microsoft PowerPoint et Google Slides. Le candidat doit être capable d'organiser le contenu de manière visuellement attrayante et professionnelle, en assurant que toutes les présentations soient à la fois captivantes et informatives.
- Compétences en recherche d’information et synthétisation : Le candidat doit posséder une aptitude marquée pour la recherche et l'analyse d'informations diverses. Ceci implique une capacité à identifier rapidement des sources d'information fiables, à extraire des données pertinentes et à les condenser en un format compréhensible et précis. La synthétisation efficace des informations est essentielle pour faciliter la prise de décision et la communication claire au sein de l'entreprise.
- Aisance marquée avec les outils technologiques : Capacité à utiliser rapidement divers outils ou applications. Bon sens de la débrouillardise, démontrant une forte capacité d’autodidactisme et de curiosité.
Qualifications requises :
- Bilingue (anglais et français)
- Excellentes compétences en communication
- Sens de l’organisation, débrouillardise et capacité à gérer plusieurs projets en même temps
- Autonomie et rapidité d’apprentissage
- Aime travailler en équipe
- Maîtrise des plateformes et outils technologiques suivants :
o Suite office : Excel, Word, Power Point (Essentiel)
o Google docs et Google Slides (Essentiel)
o Notion (Atout)
o Karbon (Atout)
o Power BI (Atout)

Hourly Range: $6.00-$8.00
Posted On: July 15, 2024 03:45 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:Microsoft Office, Google Docs, File Management, Data Entry, Presentations, Draft Correspondence, Form Completion, Email Communication
Skills: Microsoft Office, Google Docs, File Management, Data Entry, Presentations, Draft Correspondence, Form Completion, Email Communication
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Data Engineer - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a Data Engineer who will play a crucial role in building, managing, and optimizing our data infrastructure. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining robust data pipelines, ensuring the reliability and efficiency of data flows, and supporting data analytics initiatives. The ideal candidate is highly skilled in data engineering practices and has a passion for data-driven decision-making.

Key Responsibilities
• Design, develop, and maintain scalable data pipelines and ETL processes.
• Ensure data integrity, reliability, and quality by implementing best practices for data management and monitoring.
• Collaborate with data scientists, analysts, and other stakeholders to understand data requirements and deliver solutions that meet business needs.
• Develop and optimize data architectures, databases, and data warehouses.
• Troubleshoot and resolve data-related issues, ensuring minimal downtime and high availability of data services.
• Implement data security and privacy measures in compliance with relevant regulations.
• Continuously improve data engineering processes and stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies.

Required Qualifications

• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
• 3+ years of experience in data engineering or a similar role.
• Proficiency in SQL and experience with relational databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL).
• Strong programming skills in languages such as Python, Java, or Scala.
• Experience with data pipeline and workflow management tools (e.g., Apache Airflow, Luigi).
• Familiarity with cloud data platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure) and big data technologies (e.g., Hadoop, Spark).
• Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
• Strong communication and collaboration skills.

Preferred Qualifications
• Master’s degree in a related field.
• Experience with NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB, Cassandra).
• Knowledge of data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).
• Familiarity with machine learning frameworks and tools.


Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00

Skills: Python, ETL Pipeline, Data Science, Microsoft Excel, Data Management, Data Analysis, Apache Spark, Data Mining, Big Data, SQL

We are seeking a skilled Microsoft Power Apps Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will design, develop, and maintain custom business applications using Microsoft Power Apps and related technologies within the Power Platform ecosystem.

Design and develop custom applications using Microsoft Power Apps
Create and optimize workflows using Power Automate (formerly Microsoft Flow)

Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into functional applications

Experience with SharePoint and Office 365 integration

Excellent communication and teamwork abilities

Experience with Power BI for data visualization

item.title: Digital Performance Audit: Google Analytics Audit / Reports - Upwork
item.description:
Provide a comprehensive analysis of an education company’s digital performance using Google Analytics (both current and previous versions) and supplementary tools. Focus on user behavior, conversion optimization, and competitive positioning in the education sector.

Google Analytics Requests:
1 Data Transition and Comparison:
◦ Compare key metrics between analytics versions to ensure data consistency.
◦ Provide guidance on interpreting trends across the transition period.

2 Organic Traffic Analysis by Location:
◦ Compare traffic metrics for URLs containing different location keywords (e.g., Oxford, Cambridge, Toronto).
◦ Analyze the user journey funnel for each location, identifying drop-off points.
◦ Provide 5-year historical data to show long-term trends in location popularity.

3 Content Category Performance:
◦ Break down performance metrics by main subject areas.
◦ Analyze content consumption funnels for each category.
◦ Identify top-performing and underperforming content over the past 5 years.

4 UX Improvement Impact:
◦ Conduct before-and-after analysis of key metrics for pages affected by UX changes.
◦ Compare conversion rates, engagement metrics, and other relevant data pre and post-implementation.

5 Educational Pathway Performance:
◦ Analyze traffic, engagement metrics, and conversion rates for Academic Insights, Career Insights, and Online Research Programme pages.
◦ Examine traffic sources and user flow for each pathway.

6 Geographic Market Analysis:
◦ Examine traffic and conversion patterns from different countries/regions.
◦ Identify growth rates and trends by geography over the past 5 years.

7 Digital Campaign Effectiveness:
◦ Analyze performance of various digital marketing campaigns.
◦ Compare ROI across different digital channels over time.

8 Seasonal Trend Analysis:
◦ Identify patterns in traffic and conversions throughout the year.
◦ Provide year-over-year comparison of seasonal trends for the past 5 years.


Wider Sector Analysis:
• Use tools like SEMrush, Ahrefs, SimilarWeb, social media analytics platforms, Google Trends, Tableau/Power BI, survey tools, and heatmap tools to:
◦ Conduct keyword research and competitor analysis
◦ Compare traffic and engagement metrics with competitors
◦ Analyze industry trends and audience behavior
◦ Visualize data from multiple sources
◦ Gather and analyze customer feedback
◦ Understand on-site user behavior in detail
Additional Considerations:
• Address data discrepancies between analytics versions
• Ensure proper setup of custom events and conversions
• Develop strategies for maintaining reporting continuity
• Address limitations in historical data availability

Deliverables:
1 Comprehensive report covering all requested Google Analytics insights
2 Competitive analysis report using data from supplementary tools
3 Executive summary with key findings and actionable recommendations

Hourly Range: $42.00-$90.00
Posted On: July 14, 2024 12:30 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Google Analytics, Marketing Audit
Skills: Google Analytics, Marketing Audit
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Data Analyst for Small Business Project - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
We are looking for a motivated and detail-oriented data analyst to assist with a small business project. The ideal candidate should have a strong foundation in Excel and SQL, and be eager to apply their skills to real-world data problems. This is a great opportunity for someone looking to gain experience and build their portfolio.

Responsibilities:
• Clean, organize, and analyze datasets using Excel and SQL.
• Generate reports and visualizations to provide insights into business operations.
• Assist in identifying trends, patterns, and anomalies within the data.
• Collaborate with team members to understand business requirements and deliver actionable insights.
• Document processes and findings clearly and concisely.
Requirements:
• Basic proficiency in Excel (e.g., data cleaning, formulas, pivot tables, charts).
• Basic proficiency in SQL (e.g., querying databases, data manipulation).
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
• Attention to detail and commitment to accuracy.
• Good communication skills, both written and verbal.
• Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.

Preferred Qualifications:
• Previous experience with data analysis projects (academic or personal projects are acceptable).
• Knowledge of data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI) is a plus but not required.


Budget: $100
Posted On: July 14, 2024 11:16 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:SQL, Data Analysis, Statistics, Microsoft Excel, Data Cleaning

item.title: PowerBI Report Template/Layout designer to create starter report template library - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled PowerBI Report Template Designer to help us create 5-10 versions of report templates with built-in themes and various layout options. The templates should be visually appealing and user-friendly, allowing us to present data in an easily understandable format. As a designer, you will be responsible for creating visually stunning templates that align with our brand guidelines. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of PowerBI and be proficient in designing reports that effectively communicate data insights.   A portfolio of designs will be considered.  

You will be given a set of templates and frameworks to emulate and brand.  For example: I am looking for a company branded version of this: https://www.numerro.io/content-hub-templates where I have a few different layout options with an applied theme, logo, etc.
Other inspirational designs includes: https://www.datapears.com/category/all-products (but the library of report templates like numerro but with a consistent header, filter area, logo, theme is what the end product should be.)

The outcome would be a PBIX file for each layout option that would live in a Github repo and serve as a starter for a report project (ie this is not using the PBIT file feature)

Skills required:
- Proficiency in PowerBI
- Excellent design skills
- Ability to create visually appealing and user-friendly templates
- Strong understanding of data visualization principles

If you have the expertise and creativity to design exceptional PowerBI report templates, we would love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $30.00-$60.00
Posted On: July 13, 2024 16:19 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Data Visualization, Microsoft Power BI, Presentation Design, Branding Template, User Interface Design
Skills: Data Visualization, Microsoft Power BI, Presentation Design, Branding Template, User Interface Design
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Power BI dashboard visualization - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Data Visualization Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for visualizing data stored in Excel sheets, creating a simple yet effective dashboard, and developing a robust data model. Customization of colors and aesthetics to align with our brand guidelines is essential.

Key Responsibilities
Data Visualization: Create clear and effective visual representations of data from Excel sheets.
Dashboard Development: Develop a user-friendly and intuitive dashboard to display key metrics and insights.
Data Modeling: Construct a comprehensive data model to support the dashboard and ensure data integrity.
Customization: Apply custom colors and branding to the dashboard to match company guidelines.
Collaboration: Work closely with stakeholders to understand data requirements and ensure the dashboard meets business needs.
Quality Assurance: Ensure accuracy and reliability of the data displayed on the dashboard.
Documentation: Maintain thorough documentation of the data model, visualization techniques, and customization processes.
Qualifications
Educational Background: Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field.
Experience: Proven experience in data visualization and dashboard development.
Technical Skills:
Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and data modeling.
Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI, or similar).
Strong understanding of data analysis and statistical techniques.
Knowledge of color theory and design principles.
Soft Skills:
Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Attention to detail and a keen eye for design.

Budget: $10
Posted On: July 13, 2024 16:03 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Data Visualization, Microsoft Power BI, Data Analysis, Business Intelligence, Data Modeling
Skills: Data Visualization, Microsoft Power BI, Data Analysis, Business Intelligence, Data Modeling
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Power BI Dashboard and Data Linking Expert - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced Power BI expert to create interactive dashboards and link data from Sharepoint. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of Power BI's capabilities and be able to transform complex datasets into visually appealing and user-friendly dashboards. The main tasks will include designing and developing Power BI reports, creating data models, and integrating data from multiple sources.

    Key skills required:
    - Proficiency in Power BI development and data modeling
    - Extensive knowledge of Sharepoint and data integration
    - Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
    - Ability to work with complex datasets and transform them into actionable insights
    - Excellent communication and collaboration skills

    This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an expert in Power BI with a proven track record of delivering high-quality dashboards. If you have the skills and expertise we need, please apply with your portfolio showcasing your previous Power BI projects.

Hourly Range: $36.00-$72.00
Posted On: July 13, 2024 15:52 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Microsoft Excel
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Microsoft Excel
Country: United States
click to apply
